alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Decatur; Dougherty; Early; Grady; Lee; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 18 at 4:53PM EDT until June 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 334 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, APALACHICOLA, ARLINGTON, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLAKELY, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CARRABELLE, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTON, CUBA, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOUGLASVILLE, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FORRESTER, FORT GADSDEN, GRADY CO A/P, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HAWKINSTOWN, HILLIARDVILLE, HOGGARD MILL, IVEYS MILL, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MAYHAW, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MORGAN, NEWTON, PALMYRA, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PRETORIA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SMITHVILLE, SOPCHOPPY, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, TILTON, TURNER CITY, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WALKER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, AND WILLIAMSBURG.
